title: Wolletje Wit
description: The book has 14 beautifully illustrated, stiff cardboard pages, which, with the exception of the title page, all have a little four line poem by Clinge Doorenbos to tell the story of Wolletje Wit, a little white lamb. The covers of this edition are completely blank and the title, author, illustrator and publisher aren't mentioned until the second page. The edition mentioned here must date back to the early 1960s but no date is given inside the book.
author: Clinge Doorenbos
